text: Allah yahishuye inkuru nziza kurusha izindi; ari cyo gitabo (Qur’an) gifite imirongo yuzuzanya kandi yisubiramo (itarambirana), ituma imibiri y’abatinya Nyagasani wabo ikangarana (iyo bayumvise isomwa), hanyuma imibiri n’imitima byabo bikoroha (bikabasha) gusingiza Allah. Uwo ni wo muyoboro wa Allah ayoboresha uwo ashatse; kandi uwo Allah yarekeye mu buyobe ntiyagira uwamuyobora
